innovation.title: Utility Value
innovation.content: The END token is necessary for users to promote their brands through the Endurio protocol.

innovation.title: Creation Value
innovation.content: Minting END requires an actual Bitcoin transaction fee, along with mining strategy and effort, as all miners must compete for the fixed token minting rate.

innovation.title: Market Value
innovation.content: END has the properties of 'sound money,' as its creation is limited, demand is self-sustaining, and supply decreases through Referral Network rent and Brand Market fees.

innovation.title: Crypto-Secured
innovation.content: Proof of Reference verifies unfalsifiable cryptographic proofs relayed from the Bitcoin network, protecting the protocol from exploits while maintaining full decentralization.

innovation.title: Self-Initiating
innovation.content: Endurio is an on-chain branding protocol that markets its own brand, driving organic growth and enabling a potential hyper-growth rate.

about.heading: Endurio is the first Perpetuals Automated Market Maker (AMM) Protocol with infinite liquidity and no liquidation.
about.explain: Our innovative pricing mechanism utilizes a novel Asymptotic Power Curve to ensure that positions are never liquidated and liquidity is always available, even during periods of extreme market volatility.

vision.text-1: We envision a DeFi ecosystems where any token or value can be traded with leverage, long and short, by anyone, from any sides of the market.
vision.text-2: Leverage positions can be HOLD'ed with no risk of liquidation, and the market liquidity is always available.

mission.text-1: Just as Uniswap has solved the spot DEX problems. We aim to solve the perpetual futures DEX problems with our novel derivatives pricing curve.
mission.text-2: With our AMM, users can create perpetual markets for any token with their preferred leverage, interest rate, premium, and fee, providing the DeFi community with an unprecedented tool for derivatives trading, asset hedging, and market making.
